data.name: Become a pig
data.detailed_description:
Riddle Solving Game in a Magical House

You're trapped in a magical house! Explore the rooms and escape through the front door.

A riddle-solving simulation that uses words to solve the puzzles

Words are the key to solving the warding. Collect cards with letters on them to complete the word.

Multiplayer recommended

Solve the riddles with your friends. 2 or more players are recommended.

Microphone required

A microphone is absolutely necessary because you need to chant when you complete the words.
VC is also standard.

data.short_description: Online cooperative puzzle solving game using voice recognition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core Series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX760
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone
